title: Color tabs unreadable on subpanels
author: igor2x
body_snippet: On mRemoteNG 1.78.2 NB 3208: 1. Create four SSH connections and open them. Active connection is in blue color and all other inactive are in white color. 2. Move two of tabs to subpanel. Active connection is in blue color and another subpanel inactive but visible tab is in grey (both background and text is in grey).

comments.author: Kvarkas
comments.snippet: in perfect world themes should work. In our case what is a bit broken at the moment and i am not sure i will fix it before RC release, but its one of the tasks in Projects what Panels and Tabs required a bit of refactoring.
